Package persistance

Class StatisticsDDBBDAO

java.lang.Object
persistance.StatisticsDDBBDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
StatisticsDAO
public class StatisticsDDBBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatisticsDAO
Class that manages database operations regarding song plays and statistics creation

  • Method Details

    • getSongStatistics

      public int[] getSongStatistics()
      Returns the evolution of the plays per hour
      Specified by:
      getSongStatistics in interface StatisticsDAO
      Returns:
      An array of values representing the number of total plays for each hour in the last 24 hours, the last value is the current hour

    • getTimeStatistics

      public int[] getTimeStatistics()
      Returns the evolution of the time listened per hour
      Specified by:
      getTimeStatistics in interface StatisticsDAO
      Returns:
      An array of values representing the number of seconds listened for each hour in the last 24 hours, the last value is the current hour

    • getStatistics

      Returns the values regarding a certain query (statistics)

      Returns:
      Values of the query

    • addListen

      public boolean addListen​(java.lang.String nick, Song song, int seconds)
      Adds a play of a certain length to the specified song
      Specified by:
      addListen in interface StatisticsDAO
      Parameters:
      nick - Username of the logged user
      song - Song to add the play to
      seconds - Seconds this play lasted for
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • getTop5

      public Song[] getTop5​(int[] plays)
      Returns the top 5 most popular songs
      Specified by:
      getTop5 in interface StatisticsDAO
      Parameters:
      plays - Array which will be filled with the plays of each song, from most popular to least
      Returns:
      Array of songs, from most popular to least

    • deletePlayerStatistics

      public boolean deletePlayerStatistics​(java.lang.String s)
      Delete the user's statistics
      Specified by:
      deletePlayerStatistics in interface StatisticsDAO
      Parameters:
      s - User name
      Returns:
